Django-Markdown-Plus
########################

.. _description:

Fork from django_markdown_. Support django > 2.0.

.. contents::

.. _requirements:

Requirements
============

- python >= 2.7
- django >= 1.6
- markdown


.. _installation:

Installation
============

**Django markdown** should be installed using pip: ::

    pip install django-markdown-plus
